event.title: attained its city status after the ratification of Republic Act 8985 in January 12, 2001

data.event: Valencia attained its city status after the ratification of Republic Act 8985 in January 12, 2001.
The territory that now comprises the city of Valencia were former thirteen Barangays of the City of Malaybalay, Bukidnon.
In 1911, on-room barrio school was opened, and its first teacher was the late Leon Galorport.
